| HistoryText             = The Oliveri Family were a crime family that was expanding in the Bronx. The [[Frank Castle (Earth-616)|Punisher]] encountered several in the Bronx and killed a few. Two wiseguys survived and fled the scene, after which they attempted to an abandoned tenement building. Only to run into a gang of crack dealers, resulting in a gun fight. While the two sides battled it out inside, the Punisher used a crane to bring the building down on them all.{{r|Punisher: War Zone Vol 1 25}}
